references: M. E. Mays, A worst case of the Fibonacci-Sylvester expansion, J. Combin. Math. Combin. Computing, 1 (1987), 141-148.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10
maple: a:= proc(n) a(n):= `if`(n=1, 1, a(n-1)*n^(2^(n-1))) end:seq(a(n), n=1..7);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 25 2013
prog: (PARI) a(n) = prod(k=1, n, k^(2^(k-1))) \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 25 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Jeffrey Shallit_
